C F M O S 

C

com.solacesystems.poc - package com.solacesystems.poc
This Java library leverages Solace's guaranteed delivery capabilities to provide simple Leader Election events to applications requiring fault tolerance, by creating an instance of the FTMgr and binding a listener to it to receive FT role event updates.

F

FTEventListener - Interface in com.solacesystems.poc
Interface for applications interested in joining a shared Solace FT-Cluster and receiving FT state change events reflecting the state of your application's membership in the cluster.
FTMgr - Class in com.solacesystems.poc
Instances of this class bind to a FT-cluster in a Solace Message Broker and manage FT-cluster membership events for that binding.
FTMgr(Properties) - Constructor for class com.solacesystems.poc.FTMgr
Creates a new Solace session connected to a Solace Message Bus for use in joining a FT-Cluster for Leader Election and role events.
FTMgr(JCSMPSession) - Constructor for class com.solacesystems.poc.FTMgr
Uses an existing Solace session connected to a Solace Message Bus for use in joining a FT-Cluster for Leader Election and role events.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.solacesystems.poc.FTMgr
 

O

onActive(BytesXMLMessage) - Method in interface com.solacesystems.poc.FTEventListener
Invoked by the FTMgr when this listening application becomes the Active member of the cluster.
onBackup() - Method in interface com.solacesystems.poc.FTEventListener
Invoked by the FTMgr when this listening application changes to become a Backup member of the cluster.

S

start(String, FTEventListener) - Method in class com.solacesystems.poc.FTMgr
Bind to a FT cluster as a cluster member for leader election, listening for FT state change events.
startStateful(String, String, FTEventListener) - Method in class com.solacesystems.poc.FTMgr
Bind to a FT cluster as a cluster member for leader election, listening for FT state change events and the latest output from the current Active member of the FT-Cluster.
